Name: PixelOver
About the game: Pixel art animation software PixelOver is a software to transform your arts to pixel arts as best as possible, animate in realtime with pixel perfect transformations, bones and key animation system. Main features Import imags, GIF and 3D models Layers system Color adjustment, indexation, dithering and more Pixel perfect lines Parent-child transform system Bones and key animations Export to images, gif or spritesheet
